revision.text:
[[Image:br1.png|right|245px|thumb|The Double Yellow Fireball, the 0 where the ammo is located will be fixed by release]] '''This will require the [[ZDoom Community Build]]'''
{{wad | name = Baron's Rampage | author = Nemesis512 | status = Abandoned }} ==Storyline==
The year is 2034, various experiments and tests are being done on the demon known as the "Baron Of Hell". Taken to an unknown research facility as you are about to be injected with the sleeping serum, you get your chance to escape. Fleeing safety, your mission is to escape the research facility. After doing so you will make your way to the demon portal located on Phobos. You gather up any team members possible then make your way back to earth to free any remaining alive Barons. Takes place on 3 episodes
==Features==
A brand new soundtrack.
New Enemies.
New Sounds.
3, 10 level episodes.
New Weapons (all of which resemble the baron hand and shoot some sort of projectile)
Mission Objectives
And much more!
==Status==
Episode 1 : Escape - 100% Completed
Episode 2 : Phobos - 15 % Completed
Episode 3 : Back to earth - 0% Completed
Decorate Monsters : Roughly 20% Completed
Decorate Weapons : 90% Completed
==Editors Used==
Doom Builder, XWE
==Thanks To== ZDoom Community for giving ideas and feedback
Enjay for letting me use various sprites from "Marine Assault"
==Release Date==
When Its Done :D
